# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  ipat.cir ipat_step.cir ipat_step.cir.sh DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ipat_step.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}IPAT/ipat.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ipat.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}IPAT/ipat.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind;ipat")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}IPAT/ipat.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP ipat.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}IPAT/ipat.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} ipat.cir ${OutputDataDir}/IPAT/ipat.cir.prn ipat.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}IPAT/ipat.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED ipat.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}IPAT/ipat.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind;ipat")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}IPAT/ipat_step.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} ipat_step.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ipat_step.cir ${OutputDataDir}/IPAT/ipat_step.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}IPAT/ipat_step.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind;ipat")
endif()
